sub_title: SAP consultant at Saint-Gobain Autover International

profile_positions.description:
▪	Worked on the 3rd SAP roll out for Antwerp, go-live 01/01/2014
▪	Provide business process solutions on the areas order to cash, purchase to pay, material management, logistics, transportation, customs and interface to various subsystems
▪	Analyse business processes, develop solutions together with local users, regional or other central business experts and our service providers to improve the business processes.
▪	Monitor business processes site related on a daily basis
▪	Solve data issues, support master data clarifications, harmonizations and setups
▪	Create tickets and support ticket solving site related
▪	Prepare and execute testing for enhancements and release changes (UAT/Regression Test)
▪	Providing SAP support to key users, end users and business process related questions
▪	Developing user training documents and perform trainings
▪	Developing functional designs together with other central business experts and our consultants
▪	The focal business process partner for the European business process team in Frankfurt and align Antwerp related business processes with the central business processes
▪	Local owner of roles and authorizations in Antwerp
▪ 	Develop and implement reporting solutions on the collection and processing of logistic data for our Antwerp site
▪	First level support on month end closure, inventories, customs and on daily processes
▪	Responsible for the collection, manipulating, interpreting and reporting of (logistics) data to the business, using mostly MS Office (Excel, Powerpoint)
▪	Create and document business process flows, using Visio
profile_positions.title: Business Expert Logistics

profile_positions.description:
▪	Analyze the current logistics processes, customs processes, purchasing and distribution
	cost processes.
▪ 	Assisting the developers in the design of our new global SAP system and forms.
▪ 	Responsible for the system integration and user acceptance testing of SAP, 
	documenting the errors and working together with the programmers and business 
	system analysts on solving the errors.
▪ 	Responsible for the testing of systems (customs & carriers) connected to SAP.
▪ 	Responsible for providing data for table maintenance, table creation and conversions. 
▪ 	Developing training documents and providing training to the end users of the LE & WM
	modules.
▪ 	Worked on the first SAP roll out for our sites Wingles (F) and Trelleborg (SE).
▪ 	SAP knowledge on LE, WM, SD & EH&S
▪ 	Improving the Logistics processes in order to ensure operational excellence.
▪ 	Develop and implement reporting solutions on the collection and processing of logistic data for our Antwerp site.
▪ 	Support logistics operations by providing expertise and reports of carrier cost and 
	performances.
profile_positions.title: Logistics SAP Specialist

profile_positions.description:
▪	Primary contact for the PS Business for all (operational) logistics issues.
▪	Leaded carrier service review meetings.
▪	Measuring logistics performance, cost analysis and managing Logistics Service
       Providers (LSP’s)
▪	Developed the budget for freight cost for the 5 sites.
▪	Drived continuous improvement of processes to enhance service levels to customers, control cost within budgeted levels and minimize risk in the supply chain.
▪	Developed, co-ordinated and implemented Bulk & Packed Freight Tenders and negotiated rates with the hauliers.
▪	Identified and implemented cost reduction opportunities.
▪	Responsible for providing expert knowledge to the sales teams on preferred delivery terms, modal options and rates to support their pricing process as related to distribution cost.
▪ 	Developed and implemented reporting solutions on the collection and processing of logistic data.
▪	Maintained and provided KPI results to the business.
▪	Managed demurrage, checked and signed invoices from our LSP’s and worked closely with the credit department.
▪	Handling of complaints related to the sites, LSP’s and outsourced locations.
▪	Supervisor of and providing guidance to the demand planner of the outsourced activities.
▪	Negotiate rates, managing contract and resolve/ coordinate issues with the outsourced
       locations.
▪	Worked on continuous improvement of planning processes of the outsourced activities, optimized inventory levels and prevented out of stock.
profile_positions.title: Business Logistics Specialist - PS

profile_positions.description:
▪	Providing guidance for goods classified as dangerous in transport by road, air and sea for the business Fluoroproducts since January 2005. 
▪	Work with our hauliers, shipping line and department Sourcing & Logistics Europe in the event of day-to-day matters. 
▪	SAP Key-user SD, MM and Logistics/Warehousing since January 2004. Providing support to the end users and participate in testing.
▪	Provide SAP training, assist with data maintenance, cleanups and data collection.
▪	Assisting with the Go-Live of SAP R/3 for one of our businesses in the UK.
profile_positions.title: Logistics & SAP Specialist

profile_positions.description:
▪	Handling outbound and inbound shipments for the customer Samsung. Preparing shipping documents. Checking and tracing the shipments.
▪	Coordinate transport and warehouse co-ordinators.
▪	Assisted in the development of the transport manual and maintained procedures for outbound shipments.
profile_positions.title: Transport Coordinator
